ing: 1 tablespoon mayonnaise (such as Hellman'sÂ®), or more to taste
freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 dash hot pepper sauce, or to taste (optional)
des: "This has been our family's favorite guacamole for over thirty years. It's a little weird, but trust me. You'll love it!"
ins: Mix avocado and mayonnaise in a serving dish until smooth; season with black pepper and hot pepper sauce.
